00012       ultimix ,

00015             {                                   
00016                   this._element = element;
00017                   this.timeout = options.timeout;
00018                   this.timeout_callback = options.timeout_callback;

00025 ultimix.timer_widget.prototype._prepending_zero = function( Value )
00026 {
00027       if( Value < 10 )
00028       {
00029             return( '0' + Value );
00030       }
00031       else
00032       {
00033             return( '' + Value );
00034       }
00035 }

00037 ultimix.timer_widget.prototype.init = function()
00038 {
00039       obj = this;
00040       this.set_timer( this.timeout );
00041       this.timeout_callback_was_launched = false;
00042       
00043       this.start_time = Math.floor( ( new Date() ).getTime() / 1000 );
00044       window.setInterval( function(){ obj.on_tick( obj ) } , 1000 );
00045 }
00046 
00047 ultimix.timer_widget.prototype.set_timer = function( Time )
00048 {
00049       Hours = Math.floor( Time / ( 60 * 60 ) );
00050       Minutes = Math.floor( Time / 60 - Hours * 60 );
00051       Seconds = Math.floor( Time - Hours * 60 * 60 - Minutes * 60 );
00052       jQuery( this._element ).empty();
00053       jQuery( this._element ).append( '<span class="hours">' + this._prepending_zero( Hours ) + '</span>:<span class="minutes">' + this._prepending_zero( Minutes ) + '</span>:<span class="seconds">' + this._prepending_zero( Seconds ) + '</span>' );
00054 }
00055 
00056 ultimix.timer_widget.prototype.on_tick = function( obj )
00057 {
00058       Diff = Math.floor( ( new Date() ).getTime() / 1000 ) - obj.start_time;
00059       if( obj.timeout - Diff > 0 )
00060       {
00061             obj.set_timer( obj.timeout - Diff );
00062       }
00063       else
00064       {
00065             obj.set_timer( 0 );
00066             if( obj.timeout_callback_was_launched == false )
00067             {
00068                   if( obj.timeout_callback )
00069                   {
00070                         obj.timeout_callback();
00071                   }
00072                   obj.timeout_callback_was_launched = true;
00073             }
00074       }
00075 }
00076 
00077 jQuery.fn.timer_widget = function( options )
00078 {
00079       options = jQuery.extend(
00080             {
00081                   timeout                       : 600 , /*in seconds*/
00082                   timeout_callback  : false
00083             } , 
00084             options
00085       );
00086       
00087       return this.each(
00088             function()
00089             {
00090                   new ultimix.timer_widget( jQuery( this ) , options );
00091             }
00092       );
00093 }

00095 function    create_timer( element , options )
00096 {
00097       jQuery( document ).ready(
00098             function()
00099             {
00100                   new ultimix.timer_widget( jQuery( element ) , options );
00101             }
00102       );
00103 }
